name: SacraSlice
description:
It's a slow day doing housekeeping in the void until your omnipresent manager decides to make you fight living trash for entertainment. How long can you slice and dice through the endless waves of reanimated junk?

How to Play / Controls:
  • Left Click and drag to slice
  • Right Click and hold to activate shield
  • Press Enter at title screen to start
  • Press ESC at title screen to quit application
  • Hold DEL at title screen to clear high score
  • Press F at any time to toggle fullscreen
Credits:

Sound effects:  freesound.org and Myself

Music: Youtube Audio Library under Youtube Audio Library License

Known Bugs:
  • Save files are linked to the location of the .exe (moving the app will lose/restore save access). This is due to a quirk of Isolated Storage. I recommend keeping the game folder in a consistent location.
  • On rare occasions enemies will counter attack you instantly without giving you time to react.
